title: Marriages
description: Owen—married to one woman, tempted by another, unprepared for the emotional demands of his mysterious lover.Morgan—the too trusting wife who never learned.Joanie—Morgan's freewheeling sister, an experimenter with drugs, sex, and men—including her sister's husband.The woman—the nameless lover, sensual and passionate, who had much to teach and more to give.Magruder—the hitchhiker who saw a love affair brewing and went along for the ride.
author: Peter Straub
